title: Computer restarts automatically as soon almost as soon as League starts.
body: I have a late 2016 model iMac 27inch with 4gb vram and 3.3Ghz processor. It can run just about anything I throw at it with no problems (witcher 3, battlefield one, for honor, etc), but league of legends recently started causing the computer to reboot. It happened once while I was in a game and then after that, every time I opened the application, the computer automatically rebooted. Not sure what to do about it. No other game is causing this to happen. Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: Oh wow, yea that's definitely no good if League is forcing your pc to restart. A healthy pc shouldn't be restarting just because an application is opened, regardless of what program it is. If you could, grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and use it to generate some logs. Shoot those logs over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to see what's going on!
